Fox4e.TipEthos: Deity, religion or other philosophical allegiance
Fox4e.TipManage: Full lists of skills, resistances and other attributes that don't normally change during play
Fox4e.TipMinionHP: A missed attack never damages a minion
Fox4e.TipMoveConfig: Configure move speeds and special movement
Fox4e.TipNPCMath: Calculate Defences & Skills using baseline values like a Player Character
Fox4e.TipParty: Adventuring company, crew, gang, business affiliation etc.
Fox4e.TipRechargeRoll: Roll 1d6 and recharge power on a roll of
Fox4e.TipSendChat: Use this item (send card to chat)
Fox4e.TipSheetImage: Click to choose or change the portrait
Fox4e.TipXPAward: XP awarded for defeating this creature
Fox4e.settings.style-journal.Name: Journal styles
Fox4e.settings.journal-font.Name: Journal body font
Fox4e.settings.style-cct.Name: CCT styles
Fox4e.settings.style-chat.Name: Chat styles
Fox4e.settings.style-tah.Name: TAH styles
Fox4e.settings.style-vae.Name: VAE styles
Fox4e.settings.style-global.Name: Global styles
Fox4e.settings.style-chat-old.Name: Update old chat messages
Fox4e.settings.style-journal.Hint: Style Journal areas (including in other sheets) to look like official 4e material
Fox4e.settings.journal-font.Hint: Change the base journal font; try sans-serif if you find the default unpleasant to read
Fox4e.settings.style-cct.Hint: [Carousel Combat Tracker] Style the carousel/tooltips to match 4e
Fox4e.settings.style-chat.Hint: Style chat (particularly item cards)  look like official 4e material
Fox4e.settings.style-tah.Hint: [Token Action HUD] Style the TAH display to match 4e (requires Drac's 4e Tools)
Fox4e.settings.style-vae.Hint: [Visual Active Effects] Style the VAE panel to match 4e
Fox4e.settings.style-chat-ex.MovedDetail: As of v1.0, speech bubble effects formerly included as 'Extra chat styles' are now in the system-agnostic Burble module. Please check it out if you would like to use these styles! (Other Chat EX styles have been folded into Chat Styles.)
Fox4e.settings.style-global.Hint: Tweaks various parts of the Foundry interface to work a little better with the 4e look. (May cause unexpected issues with other modules.)
Fox4e.settings.style-chat-old.Hint: Attempts to update older chat messages (generated prior to system v0.4.44) to newer styling, in case you can't delete them yet. For performance reasons, please turn this off if you've cleared your chat since 0.4.44
